name: Slow Healing Potion
description: A potion that restores health points.
looks: A small, glass vial filled with a glowing, green liquid.

name: Confusion Bomb
description: A throwable bomb that creates a cloud of confusion, causing enemies to become disoriented.
looks: The bomb is a small, round object with a fuse. When thrown, it explodes and releases a colorful cloud of smoke.

special_effects.Confusion: Causes enemies within the cloud of smoke to become confused, affecting their movement and actions.
special_effects.Disorientation: Enemies have a chance to attack each other instead of the player.

name: Health Restoration Potion
description: A potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a glowing blue liquid.

name: Poison Resistance Potion
description: A potion that increases the user's resistance to poison for a certain amount of time.
looks: The potion is a small glass vial filled with a murky green liquid.

name: Iron Sword
description: A standard iron sword used by warriors.
looks: The sword has a simple, straight blade made of iron with a leather-wrapped hilt.

name: Lightning Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of lightning.
looks: The staff is made of polished oak and crackles with electricity.

special_effects.Chain Lightning: Has a chance to chain lightning to nearby enemies

name: Speedy Boots
description: A pair of boots that enhances the user's speed and agility.
looks: The boots are made of a lightweight and durable material, with a sleek design. They are adorned with intricate patterns and have a slight shimmer in the sunlight.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll that contains the Fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with a wax emblem. It radiates a faint warmth.

special_effects.spell_book: Allows the user to learn the Fireball spell.

name: Speed Elixir
description: A potion that grants increased speed to the user for a short duration.
looks: The elixir is a small glass vial filled with a sparkling, golden liquid.

name: Invisibility Potion
description: A potion that grants temporary invisibility to the user.
looks: A small glass bottle filled with a transparent liquid.

special_effects.Invisibility: Grants temporary invisibility to the user
